sentences.sContent: You should have a try, don't swallow anybody.
sentences.sCn: 不要轻信任何人，你得亲自去试一试。

sentences.sContent: However, his friend successfully persuaded him to have a try.
sentences.sContent_eng: However, his friend successfully persuaded him to have a try.
sentences.sCn: 但是，他的朋友成功地说服他尝试了一下。
